name: Bored Meeting
description:
Bored Meeting is a fast paced meeting arcade game in which you play an employee with a high strung boss. Respond to emails, texts, and tasks given to you by your boss. It is a virtual reality game that requires a VR headset and Leap Motion to enjoy.

Created by Brett Chalabian, Nicolas Mockovciak, and Matteo Vesprini-Heidrich.
